channel.title: How Can I Make An Automatic Login?
channel.description: So To Login To My Application I Use Username And Pass, Is There Any Code That Shows An Automatic Login for ex. making a txt file with user;pass and reading it?

item.title: How Can I Make An Automatic Login?
item.dc:creator: lIMonkieIl
item.description:
Like i said use the link and search
Breack it down like this to make it easier to research.

First find out how to write text to a .txt file or .csv file.
Then how to read that file to use the info

Then if successful login save the details to file.
Next time your app opens have it look for that file and details if they exist fill in the text boxers.

Read full topic

item.title: How Can I Make An Automatic Login?
item.dc:creator: VVS
item.description:
How Can I Save The username.Text and password.Text in a text file in user;pass format

    private void guna2Button4_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
    {
        KeyAuthApp.login(username.Text, password.Text);
        if (KeyAuthApp.response.success)
        {
            Loading main = new Loading();
            main.Show();
            this.Hide();
        }
        else
        {
            incorrect_msg main = new incorrect_msg();
            main.Show();
        }
